description: This dashboard displays metrics from a DCGM Exporter on a Kubernetes cluster.

targets.expr: count by (modelName) (DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_UTIL{Hostname=~"$host", gpu=~"$gpu"} * on (pod,namespace) group_left(host_ip) kube_pod_info{pod=~".*-${user}-.*"})
sum ((DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_USED{Hostname=~"$host", gpu=~"$gpu"} + DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_FREE) * on (pod,namespace) group_left(host_ip) kube_pod_info{pod=~".*-${user}-.*"})

panels.title: GPU Tensor Core 实时利用率

targets.expr: max by (Hostname,gpu) (DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_UTIL{Hostname=~"$host", gpu=~"$gpu"} * on (pod,namespace) group_left(host_ip) kube_pod_info{pod=~".*-${user}-.*"})
max by (Hostname,gpu) (DCGM_FI_PROF_PIPE_TENSOR_ACTIVE{Hostname=~"$host", gpu=~"$gpu"} * on (pod,namespace) group_left(host_ip) kube_pod_info{pod=~".*-${user}-.*"})

max by (Hostname,gpu) (DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_USED{Hostname=~"$host", gpu=~"$gpu"} / (DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_USED{Hostname=~"$host", gpu=~"$gpu"} + DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_FREE{Hostname=~"$host", gpu=~"$gpu"}) * on (pod,namespace) group_left(host_ip) kube_pod_info{pod=~".*-${user}-.*"})
max by (Hostname,gpu) (DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_USED{Hostname=~"$host", gpu=~"$gpu"} * on (pod,namespace) group_left(host_ip) kube_pod_info{pod=~".*-${user}-.*"})

panels.description: GPU 设备在内存复制操作过程中的利用率

targets.expr: max by (Hostname,gpu) (DCGM_FI_DEV_MEM_COPY_UTIL{Hostname=~"$host", gpu=~"$gpu"} * on (pod,namespace) group_left(host_ip) kube_pod_info{pod=~".*-${user}-.*"})

panels.title: GPU Mem Copy 利用率

targets.expr: max by (Hostname,gpu) (DCGM_FI_DEV_POWER_USAGE{Hostname=~"$host", gpu=~"$gpu"} * on (pod,namespace) group_left(host_ip) kube_pod_info{pod=~".*-${user}-.*"})
max by (Hostname,gpu) (DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{Hostname=~"$host", gpu=~"$gpu"} * on (pod,namespace) group_left(host_ip) kube_pod_info{pod=~".*-${user}-.*"})
max by (Hostname,gpu) (DCGM_FI_DEV_SM_CLOCK{Hostname=~"$host", gpu=~"$gpu"} * 1000000 * on (pod,namespace) group_left(host_ip) kube_pod_info{pod=~".*-${user}-.*"})

title: Crater User Nvidia Dashboard
